name: Carlos Hernández
bio: A dynamic presence in goal, Carlos Hernández commands his area with confidence and a fierce determination. Growing up in the vibrant culture of Mérida, he combines agility with sharp reflexes, turning potential goals into mere whispers of defeat for the opponents. Known for his fearless dives and quick throws, he's the backbone of Yucatán Force, embodying the spirit of the Mayan heartland with every save.
